roleset.name: generally terrible, displeasing

example.name: both args
example.text: He was awful to me in the end, why can't I get over him

example.name: empty it, arg1
example.text: It was awful to know that he felt all the deaths deeply and yet he still went out to kill others in order to protect his beloved village.
example.arg: to know that he felt all the deaths deeply and yet he still went out to kill others in order to protect his beloved village.

example.name: concatenation of arg1
example.text: He was awful to look at, to me his face was greenish white

roleset.note: AWFUL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, good.01. (from awful.01-j)

roleset.name: horribly unskilled at

example.name: both args
example.text: He is awful at everything except finances but his parents still let him "help out" around the farm.

roleset.note: AWFUL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, good.02. (from awful.02-j)

roleset.name: extremely unbeneficial, unhealthful

example.name: both args
example.text: I know soda is awful for you, but has anyone had the Mexican coke?

roleset.note: AWFUL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, good.04. (from awful.03-j)
